product.title: ZDATT Hair Dryer Volumizer, 4 in 1 Salon Styling Hot Air Brush and Styler, Negative Ion Straightening Brush Curl Brush, Multi-functiona(AA)
product.description:
ZDATT HAIR DRYER VOLUMIZER, 4 IN 1 SALON STYLING HOT AIR BRUSH AND STYLER, NEGATIVE ION STRAIGHTENING BRUSH CURL BRUSH, MULTI-FUNCTIONA(AA)




PRODUCT DETAILS
 
 * Product Dimensions: 5 x 5 x 0.7 inches
 * Shipping Weight: 1.5 pounds
 * #64 in Hot-Air Hair Brushes

 * Quality is Always Our First PriorityNegative Lonic Technology,The negative ions released by the hot air comb can increase the moisture of the hair, reduce the damage of the hair, nourish the hair,completely eliminates frizz and enhances shine for silky smooth hair,without static electricity.
 * Multi-functional Hot Air Brush4-in-1 Hot air brush is perfect combination of dryer,use it as a blow dryer,hair styler, volumize your locks, make your hair curly or wavy and straighten it of course. Perfect for dry as well as wet hair and all hair types. Efficient & Time Saving for salon blowouts at home.
 * Unique DesignedHair curling & straightening brush is designed with Nylon Pin & Tufted Bristles for easy detangle grip of your hair. The 360 swivel cord allows high flexibility to move freely without the cord becoming tangled and damaged.
 * Multiple Heat Settings3 adjustable heat-levels for different hair types, high heat to thick hair, low heat for fine hair, flexible setting to lock in your beautiful hairstyle.This volumizer can be placed closer to the scalp for lift.
 * COMPLETE QUALIFICATION CERTIFICATEZDATT ionic hair brush have multiple certifications like ROHS, FCC, CE and CCC

 

 Read more Wattage: 1000W power Voltage: 110V-125V/50-60HzPower Cord: 2.0m Length: 12.8inch/32.5cm Width: 2.95inch/7.5cm PackageIncluded: 1 x Hot hair brush 1x User Manual 2 x Color Clips Product FeaturesNegative Lons Technology provides less damage to hair cuticles, creating asmoother, silky final finish to your hair. The 360 Swivel Cord allowsflexibity required for stylists to move freely without the cord becomingtangled or damaged. It's perfectfor today's advanced styling techniques.Flexible, Tangle Free Bristles With Masaging Ball, help dry, smooth and stylehair in half the time. The hot hair brush help reduce moisture in hair forfaster drying and less damage. FASTER, LESS DAMAGE - The brush help reducemoisture in hair for faster drying and less damage. It also reducesfrizz andstatic, which make the hair soft and shiny. LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN - Ceramics highquality spread the heat for all the surface of the plate. Negative ionssurround each hair strand eliminate static and frizz, providing brighter. Readmore Read more 2 Heat/Speed Settings provide three options for your stylingflexibility.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
